content: You step closer to the door from which the sounds seem to be coming and listen more closely. As you strain your ears, you can make out the sound of hushed voices and shuffling footsteps. The voices sound urgent, but you can't quite make out what they're saying. You can feel your heart racing as you wonder what could be behind the door. You consider whether to open the door and investigate, or to explore one of the other doors in the corridor. What do you choose to do?
